title: PROTOTYPE 2
description: The Games on Demand version supports  English, German.  Download the manual for this game by locating the game on http://marketplace.xbox.com and selecting “See Game Manual".  WELCOME TO NEW YORK ZERO. Prototype ® 2 takes the unsurpassed carnage of the original Prototype® and continues the experience of becoming the ultimate shape-shifting weapon. A devastating viral outbreak has claimed the lives of Sgt James Heller’s family and transformed him into a PROTOTYPE.  Powered by incredible new shapeshifting powers and abilities, you must hunt, kill and consume your way across the infected wasteland of New York Zero to take revenge on the man responsible: Alex Mercer.

childDownloads.title: Announcement Trailer
childDownloads.description: PROTOTYPE 2® takes the unsurpassed carnage of Radical Entertainment’s original best-selling open-world game of 2009 – PROTOTYPE™ and delivers the most over-the-top action game of 2012. Create a path through the viral wastelands of NYZ and build up a vast genetic arsenal as you hunt, kill and consume your way towards your ultimate goal… destroying Alex Mercer!

childDownloads.title: Bio-bomb Butt Kicker Trailer
childDownloads.description: Pre-order Prototype 2® at GameStop today and receive exclusive access to the Bio-bomb Butt Kicker. Exclusively at GameStop through June 12, 2012 while supplies last.

childDownloads.title: Blackwatch Pilot Uniform
childDownloads.description: As Sgt James Heller, disguise yourself as part of the elite Blackwatch military force and destroy the Blackwatch virus in this official Blackwatch Pilot Uniform from Prototype® 2.

childDownloads.title: Blackwatch Pilot Uniform
childDownloads.description: As Sgt James Heller, disguise yourself as part of the elite Blackwatch military force and destroy the Blackwatch virus in this official Blackwatch Pilot Uniform from Prototype® 2.

childDownloads.title: Blackwatch Soldier Uniform

childDownloads.title: Blackwatch Winged Tee

childDownloads.title: Blackwatch Winged Tee
childDownloads.description: Wear the symbol of the feared Blackwatch military force with this official Blackwatch Winged Tee from Prototype® 2.

childDownloads.title: Colossal Mayhem Pack
childDownloads.description: Are you ready to go Thermobaric?!? Introducing the “Colossal Mayhem” Pack - the ultimate collection of carnage-inducing content is now available for purchase. [PROTOTYPE®2] fans will not want to miss out on these new exclusive powers, skins and upgrades... including the Thermobaric Boomstick, three new awesome skins [Heller Test Subject, Infected Heller, Infantry Heller] and three new Force Multiplier powers [Warp Vortex, Anti Gravity Field, Air Time]. Kitchen sink is not included.

childDownloads.title: Excessive Force Pack
childDownloads.description: Introducing the “Excessive Force” Pack, the most insanely over-the-top pack Radical Entertainment® has ever created!! Ever wanted to one-shot ANY enemy with a Retina Plasma Laser or get your hands all over an experimental “Viral Infector Grenade Launcher”? Also includes three all new and awesome skins [Armored Heller, Agile Armor Alex Mercer, Zombie Mercer] and three new over the top Force Multiplier powers [Shockwave, Chaos Creator mode, Medusa's Wrath] . You know you want it!

childDownloads.title: Gentek Hazmat Suit
childDownloads.description: Don't get infected! Protect yourself from the Blacklight virus, with this official Gentek Hazmat Suit from Prototype® 2.

childDownloads.title: Gentek Hazmat Suit
childDownloads.description: Don't get infected! Protect yourself from the Blacklight virus, with this official Gentek Hazmat Suit from Prototype® 2.

childDownloads.title: Gentek Tee

childDownloads.title: Hammerfist Arms
childDownloads.description: Now you're playing with power! Here's your chance to wear the official Hammerfist arms of Sgt James Heller from Prototype® 2.

childDownloads.title: Heller vs. Mercer
childDownloads.description: Video developer diary explaining why Radical decided to create a new protagonist, Sgt. James Heller, and make Alex Mercer the bad guy.

childDownloads.title: Pack Leader
childDownloads.description: Summon your very own infected pack of miniature Brawlers from Prototype® 2! Ankle bandages not included.

childDownloads.title: Power of Revenge Trailer
childDownloads.description: PROTOTYPE 2® takes the unsurpassed carnage of Radical Entertainment's original best-selling open-world game of 2009 - PROTOTYPE and delivers the most over-the-top action game of 2012. Create a path through the viral wastelands of NYZ and build up a vast genetic arsenal as you hunt, kill and consume your way towards your ultimate goal... destroying Alex Mercer!

childDownloads.title: PROTOTYPE 2 E3 Trailer
childDownloads.description: The official PROTOTYPE 2 reveal trailer for E3 2011.

childDownloads.title: RADNET Access Pack
childDownloads.description: This is the RADNET Access Pack that is included with all new RADNET Edition copies of Prototype® 2. Activate the RADNET Access Pack to gain access to awesome events, challenges and exclusive rewards including the ultimate skin unlock... Alex Mercer! RADNET events and challenges will allow you to compete for higher scores against your friends.

childDownloads.title: RADNET Trailer
childDownloads.description: A limited number of the launch quantities of Prototype® 2 will contain free access to RADNET via a one-time use code that gives fans 55 free pieces of additional content delivered for seven weeks following the game's launch. This weekly scheduled content will include in-game Events, Challenges, Avatar Items and Behind-the-Scenes videos, as well as bonus Mutations for Prototype 2's main campaign. Fans that participate in ALL of RADNET's weekly challenges and events will unlock the ultimate shape-shifting reward...to be revealed in March 2012. Prototype 2's RADNET Edition content will only be available for free while supplies last.

childDownloads.title: Collector’s Edition Trailer
childDownloads.description: Announcing the Collector's Edition for Prototype 2 on the Xbox 360 video game and entertainment system from Microsoft. Limited Quantities available.

childDownloads.title: The Power of Tendrils - Teaser Trailer
childDownloads.description: PROTOTYPE 2 - "The Power of Tendrils" - Teaser Trailer
